TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以处理事件，以便提供自定义排序。You can handle the event to provide custom sorting. 此事件时才会发生时未设置属性和属性设置为`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property is set to `false`. 为每个对中正在排序的列的单元格一次发生此事件。This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted. 仅当用户单击与列的标头时，才发生属性值，或当调用重载。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 当发生此事件时对具有的列属性值，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 你可以使用此事件在一个列或多个列中使用的单元值的行进行排序。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用和属性中指定的列中的单元格值进行比较属性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用和属性，以访问通过其他列中的值集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As DataGridViewColumn

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可确定和控制中以编程方式排序的排序行为。This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 在此示例中的 ID 列用于确定最终顺序，如果有相同的值在已排序的列中，因此没有其他的排序将如果 ID 列中有重复值完成。In this example the ID column is used to determine the final order if there are identical values in the sorted column, so no additional sorting will be done if there are duplicate values in the ID column. 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对基于多个列中的单元值的行进行排序时，此属性很有用。This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SortResult { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.

value.span: 小于零，如果第一个单元格将排序的第二个单元格; 之前第一个单元格和第二个单元格具有等效值; 如果为零大于零，如果第二个单元格将之前的第一个单元进行排序。

span.span: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此值通常是将执行的处理程序中的最后一个操作事件。Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the event. 你将通常将该值设置为比较方法的返回值如。You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
